Edit the config. A default config will be created if it doesn't exist

Command Flags:

  --editor : path to editor
    type : string
    value : emacs
    setby : envvar
    default : [vi]
    configpath : editor
    envvars : [EDITOR]
    required : true

Inherited Section Flags:

  --help : Print help
    type : string
    value : default
    setby : appdefault
    default : [default]

Examples:

# Use defaults
grabbit config edit

# Override defaults
grabbit config edit --config-path /path/to/config --editor code
